prompts: Create a majestic fire-type Pokemon resembling a lion with a vivid red mane.
I want a fierce, quadrupedal Pokemon that embodies the spirit of flames and bravery.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a lion, with fiery colors and a proud stance.
Make a unique fire and normal-type Pokemon that has a striking appearance and intimidating gaze.
Imagine a Pokemon with a fiery mane and a sleek black body, ready for battle.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of a lion and flames, showcasing power and elegance.
Show me a Pokemon with a majestic mane that glows like fire, embodying confidence and strength.
